metadata.name: prediction_markets
metadata.description: Tinder-style prediction markets with Arcium privacy

instructions.name: aggregate_votes
docs: Aggregate votes for market state calculation (called periodically or on-demand)

instructions.name: calculate_market_odds
docs: Calculate market odds using encrypted vote data
This reveals aggregated market odds without revealing individual votes

instructions.name: calculate_user_payout
docs: Calculate payout for user using MPC
This queues an encrypted computation to calculate the user's payout
based on their encrypted vote and the market outcome

instructions.name: claim_payout
docs: Claim payout after calculation
User must decrypt their payout amount client-side and verify

instructions.name: create_market
docs: Creates a new prediction market with encrypted voting
# Arguments
* `market_id` - Unique identifier for this market
* `title` - Market question (max 200 chars)
* `description` - Detailed description (max 1000 chars)
* `image_url` - Market image URL (max 200 chars)
* `category` - Market category (Sports, Politics, etc.)
* `voting_ends_at` - Unix timestamp when voting closes
* `oracle_type` - Type of oracle for resolution

instructions.name: init_aggregate_comp_def
docs: Initialize computation definition for aggregate_market_votes with offchain circuit storage

instructions.name: init_calculate_odds_comp_def
docs: Initialize computation definition for calculate_market_odds with offchain circuit storage

instructions.name: init_calculate_payout_comp_def
docs: Initialize computation definition for calculate_payout with offchain circuit storage

instructions.name: init_submit_vote_comp_def
docs: Initialize computation definition for submit_private_vote with offchain circuit storage

instructions.name: initialize_user_profile
docs: Initialize user profile for tracking stats and reputation

instructions.name: resolve_market
docs: Resolve market with oracle outcome
Only authorized oracle can call this to finalize the market

instructions.name: submit_encrypted_vote
docs: Submit encrypted vote to prediction market
This queues an MPC computation that validates and processes the encrypted vote
without revealing individual vote choices to anyone
# Arguments
* `vote_data_encrypted` - Encrypted vote data (32 bytes per field x 7 fields, voter derived from signer)
* `vote_encryption_pubkey` - User's x25519 public key
* `vote_nonce` - Nonce for vote encryption
* `stake_amount` - Amount staked on this prediction

errors.name: RequiresValidatorResolution
errors.msg: Requires validator resolution due to disputes

errors.name: InvalidOracleType
errors.msg: Invalid oracle type for this resolution method

types.name: AggregateMarketVotesOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: CalculateMarketOddsOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: CalculatePayoutOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: ClockAccount
docs: An account storing the current network epoch

types.name: ComputationDefinitionAccount
docs: An account representing a [ComputationDefinition] in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationDefinitionMeta
docs: A computation definition for execution in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationSignature
docs: The signature of a computation defined in a [ComputationDefinition].

types.name: Epoch
docs: The network epoch

types.name: MXEAccount
docs: A MPC Execution Environment.

types.name: NodeRef
docs: A reference to a node in the cluster.
The offset is to derive the Node Account.
The current_total_rewards is the total rewards the node has received so far in the current
epoch.

types.name: Output
docs: An output of a computation.
We currently don't support encrypted outputs yet since encrypted values are passed via
data objects.

types.name: Parameter
docs: A parameter of a computation.
We differentiate between plaintext and encrypted parameters and data objects.
Plaintext parameters are directly provided as their value.
Encrypted parameters are provided as an offchain reference to the data.
Data objects are provided as a reference to the data object account.

types.name: PredictionMarket
docs: Main prediction market account with encrypted vote state
Note: encrypted_vote_state and nonce are placed early for fixed offset access

types.name: SubmitPrivateVoteOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: UserPosition
docs: User's encrypted position in a market

types.name: UserProfile
docs: User profile for reputation and statistics
